org.openimaj.hadoop.tools.twitter.token.mode.dfidf

Class CountTweetsInTimeperiod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.hadoop.mapreduce.stage.StageProvider
      • org.openimaj.hadoop.tools.twitter.token.mode.dfidf.CountTweetsInTimeperiod

  • public class CountTweetsInTimeperiod
extends StageProvider
    A mapper/reducer whose purpose is to do the following: function(timePeriodLength) So a word in a tweet can happen in the time period between t - 1 and t. First task: map input: tweetstatus # json twitter status with JSONPath to words map output: , -1: > reduce input: ,...,]> reduce output: ,,,...>
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
